[opt][audio] fix compile error
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #5146, REDMINE-id

[opt][JDI] Optimize JDI driver
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail] 1.Using lppwmx rt_device APIs to control LPTIME 2.Move PBR_LPTIM2_OUT pinmux setting to board configuration 3.Add "bf0_hal_lptim.h" into "bf0_hal.h"
Change-Id: Ibd241d768ee746ef52c70fd99018e21bc99919b1

[opt][audio] allow disable uplink agc by Automatic Speech Recognition app
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine:
[Description in detail] Describe the change in more detail, e.g. how is the problem fixed, why do you make the modification in this way, explain the feature in more details
Change-Id: Ibf93216aab9973a2cac9280ff69cd080e6e1a5fb

[bug][gitlab-ci] Fix a problem where too many build projects would cause an error in the collect phase
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail] For gitlab ci, you can NEEDS up to 50 other jobs per job, so the script will report an error in projects with more than 50 sub-jobs. Now a sub-collect phase is introduced, which divides the collect into multiple processes
Change-Id: I94aae8bfd11265f3ada1538740a77d1c3cbd4939
Change-Id: I2bf324dbfaa146842c156abf124f78ad1c83cfc5

[new][board][ec-lb587_a2] Add 587evb board using A2 chip
ext-redmine: #5725, REDMINE-5725
[Description in detail]
Change-Id: I4d8ab6836729730cf27fae06bc9f3f63561a1d0f
HID接口只用来进行配置，没有调试功能的。所以你选能用的那个就行了，肯定都是winusb高速的。 另外如果有新的问题，最好新建一个issue，这个issue只讨论新的需求
Commented on #62 HSLink Pro存在连接不稳定的问题
其实HSLink板上自带的电平转换芯片已经足够，无需再添加额外的buffer了。我觉得您的问题更多的应该还是驱动能力过强导致的信号反射，再增加新的buffer增强信号驱动反而有可能适得其反
